name: Clockwork Hotel
description:
The Clockwork Hotel is known for its innovative automated wake-up service. Just be careful not to wake guest wearing eye-masks, they would rather sleep in. 

Made for GMTK Jam 2019. The theme is "only one," so this game is playable with just one button. 

CREDITS

Stuart Urback: Level Design, Programming

Dan McAlister: Level Design, Visuals, Audio
